DOC.brief_summary: Investigators aim conduct observational study order ass thoroughly patient implanted Extracorporeal carbon dioxide removal ( ECCO2R ) 10 critical care unit Paris surburb ( APHP , Assistance Publique de hôpitaux de Paris ) . Secondary objective : 1. ass efficacy safety ECCO2R , 2. compare data issue registry others study assess population center 3. compare different ECCOR device term efficacy adverse event .
DOC.brief_title: Registry EXperience Extracorporeal CO2 Removal Intensice Care Units
DOC.detailed_description: The registry conduct prospectively 2 year 10 ICUs l'APHP behalf CEDIT . The 10 center : ( 1 ) ICU l'hôpital europeén Georges Pompidou , ( 2 ) ICU l'Hôpital Louis Mourier , ( 3 ) ICU l'Hôpital de Bicêtre , ( 4 ) ICU GHPS , ( 5 ) Respiratory ICU GHPS , ( 6 ) ICU l'Hôpital Lariboisière ( 7 ) ICU l'Hôpital Cochin ( 8 ) ICU l'Hôpital Saint-Antoine ( 9 ) ICU l'Hôpital Henri Mondor ( 10 ) ICU l'Hôpital Tenon . The primary outcome number patient implanted ECCO2R monthly center 2 year period study . Secondary outcomes ICU-mortality , invasive ventilation duration , non invasive ventilation duration , ICU duration , modality ventilation ICU discharge , hemorragic complication due ECCOR device , thrombotic complication due ECCO2R device , intravascular hemolysis due ECCO2R device , duration ECCO2R , adjunct therapy ECCO2R reason ECCO2R discontinuation .
